div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2374 Tourdan, 50 km. S of Lyon, 1890 (1124) Burial: mid 2nd cent. B.C. (Rolland) Contents: 244 AR, 1 AE?. In iron container Massalia: 161 ob. 1 AE Histiaea: 1 tetrob. Gallic: remainder Disposition: St.-Germain-en-Laye (part) † Allotte de la Fuÿe, Tourdan, 62 pp., illus. Blanchet, Traité, p. 569, no. 124 (totals of Gallic here given would make hd. total 314); RN 1896, pp. 131-2 Rolland, RN 1959-60, p. 48 (109 ob. examined)
